title: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
description: Bug 2345[Editor Mgmt] Open with a different type of editor has no effect if file already open (1GEWMSQ)
OB: When selecting 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' for a file that is already open in the scripted resource editor example, nothing happens. The file remains open in the scripted resource editor example and is not opened in the default text editor.
EB: If a file is already open in a specific type of editor and the user selects 'Open With... / Default Text Editor' for the same file, the default text editor should open a new editor for the file, replacing the existing editor.
SR:
1. Open the scripted resource editor example.
2. Create a new basic project.
3. Create a new file named 'test.xml'.
4. Select 'test.xml' in the Navigator.
5. Choose 'Open With... / Default Text Editor'.

Expected behavior: The default text editor should open a new editor for 'test.xml', replacing the existing scripted resource editor example. The file should be displayed in the default text editor.
